title: Professor the Hon. Gareth Evans, AC, KC | The Simons Foundation

quotes: From 2000–2009 Gareth Evans was President and Chief Executive Officer of the International Crisis Group.
In 2000 he was invited by Lloyd Axworthy, Canada’s Foreign Minister at that time, to co-chair the Canadian International Commission on Intervention and State Sovereignty,
which, in 2001, published its ground-breaking report, The Responsibility to Protect.
He has been cited as one of the Top 100 Global Thinkers in 2011 'for making the responsibility to protect more than academic.'
